name: stock_v2_get_analysis_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetch analysis data for a specific stock using Morningstar API.

performanceid.description: The performance ID of the stock, obtained from endpoints such as auto-complete, get-summary, or get-movers.
